subject: Sinsonn Shipping Notice #SSN2105
description_text: Hello, please provide your address information again. We cannot ship to PO box addresses.

conversations.body_text: Hi Johnpeterbecker,    Please reply as soon as possible!

It is not a PO box. It is a FPO address:

PSC 901
Box 32
FPO AE 09805

V/r
John

On Thu, Jul 24, 2025, 1:54 PM support@simsonn.com
Hi Johnpeterbecker,     Can you provide a residential address, as our US warehouse staff say they cannot ship to a military FPO address?

If you cannot ship to an FPO, then the order needs to be cancelled and
refunded. I can see about ordering through Amazon who can support delivery
to FPOs.

Thanks.

V/r
John

On Fri, Jul 25, 2025 at 5:13 AM support@simsonn.com
Hi Johnpeterbecker,    We apologise, but Amazon is unable to deliver to military addresses.
Hi Johnpeterbecker,    Please provide a shipping address as soon as possible, and we will ship your order from our US warehouse as soon as possible.

Please ship to 9381 Laser Ln, La Mesa, CA, 91941. Thank you.

On Wed, Jul 30, 2025, 6:40 AM support@simsonn.com

Could you please deliver to the following address:

9381 Laser Ln
La Mesa, CA 91941
